name: AWS Lambda
natural_language_description: 这是 AWS Lambda 节点。主要用于: Invoke functions on AWS Lambda

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: iam

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: invoke

function.name: function
function.description: The function you want to invoke. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
function.natural_language_description: 参数名: Function Name or ID | 作用: The function you want to invoke. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

qualifier.name: qualifier
qualifier.description: Specify a version or alias to invoke a published version of the function
qualifier.natural_language_description: 参数名: Qualifier | 作用: Specify a version or alias to invoke a published version of the function | 默认值: $LATEST | (必填项)

invocationType.name: invocationType
invocationType.description: Specify if the workflow should wait for the function to return the results
invocationType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Invocation Type | 作用: Specify if the workflow should wait for the function to return the results | 默认值: RequestResponse
available_options: Wait for Results (值: RequestResponse) - Invoke the function synchronously and wait for the response
Continue Workflow (值: Event) - Invoke the function and immediately continue the workflow

payload.name: payload
payload.description: The JSON that you want to provide to your Lambda function as input
payload.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON Input | 作用: The JSON that you want to provide to your Lambda function as input
